pullRequest.title: Lots of 1.14.4 mappings
pullRequest.bodyText:
Lots of minor field/method mappings
Backports #1458 to 1.14.4
Fixed the editorconfig

commit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: liach <7806504+liach@users.noreply.github.com>

nodes.bodyText: please no is prefix for fields

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	METHOD method_20219 notifyNearbyNpcs ()V
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_20518 isRaider (Lnet/minecraft/class_1309;)Z
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_20520 makeGlow (Lnet/minecraft/class_1309;)V
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_20219 notifyMemoriesOfBell ()V
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_20518 isRaiderEntity (Lnet/minecraft/class_1309;)Z
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_20520 glowEntity (Lnet/minecraft/class_1309;)V
          
      
    
    
  

Mappings of these methods in 1.16-pre5
